Package com.nuance.android.vocalizer

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    VocalizerAudioOutputListener
    Interface for clients wishing to receive audio samples during speech synthesis.
    VocalizerEngineListener
    Interface for clients wishing to listen for engine state changes, as well notifications when speech items begin and end.
    VocalizerSpeechMarkListener
    Interface for clients wishing to register to receive speech mark events that occur during speech synthesis.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    VocalizerAudioSettings
    This class represents a audio output settings to be used while synthesizing speech.
    VocalizerEngine
    Class for interacting with the Vocalizer Expressive Text-to-Speech engine.
    VocalizerSpeechItem
    This class represents an item that has been queued for synthesis.
    VocalizerSpeechMark
    Wraps information about a speech mark event that occurs during speech synthesis.
    VocalizerVersion
    Wraps information about the Vocalizer engine
    VocalizerVoice
    Wraps information about a voice that can be used by Vocalizer in order to synthesize text.
